complex.hpp

00001 #ifndef  BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COMPLEX_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COMPLEX_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // serialization/utility.hpp:
00011 // serialization for stl utility templates
00012 
00013 // (C) Copyright 2007 Matthias Troyer . 
00014 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00015 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00016 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)

00019 
00020 #include <complex>
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/is_bitwise_serializable.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace serialization {
00029 
00030 template<class Archive, class T>
00031 inline void serialize(
00032     Archive & ar,
00033     std::complex<T> & t,
00034     const unsigned int file_version 
00035 ){
00036     boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, file_version);
00037 }
00038 
00039 template<class Archive, class T>
00040 inline void save(
00041     Archive & ar,
00042     std::complex<T> const& t,
00043     const unsigned int /* file_version */
00044 ){
00045     const T re = t.real();
00046     const T im = t.imag();
00047     ar << boost::serialization::make_nvp("real", re);
00048     ar << boost::serialization::make_nvp("imag", im);
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<class Archive, class T>
00052 inline void load(
00053     Archive & ar,
00054     std::complex<T>& t,
00055     const unsigned int /* file_version */ 
00056 ){
00057     T re;
00058     T im;
00059     ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("real", re);
00060     ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("imag", im);
00061     t = std::complex<T>(re,im);
00062 }
00063 
00064 // specialization of serialization traits for complex
00065 template <class T>
00066 struct is_bitwise_serializable<std::complex<T> >
00067     : public is_bitwise_serializable<T> {};
00068 
00069 template <class T>
00070 struct implementation_level<std::complex<T> >
00071     : mpl::int_<object_serializable> {} ;
00072 
00073 // treat complex just like builtin arithmetic types for tracking
00074 template <class T>
00075 struct tracking_level<std::complex<T> >
00076     : mpl::int_<track_never> {} ;
00077 
00078 } // serialization
00079 } // namespace boost
00080 
00081 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COMPLEX_HPP
